Caption: Prof.K.T.Chandy(Chairman, Board of Governors) deliver the Convocation address and from left on the dias Prof.K.A.V.Pandalai(Director), Shrimati Indira Gandhi (Prime Minister of India and Cheif Guest), Shir K.K.Sha(Governor of Tamil nadu), Shir C.Subramaniam(Union Minnistry), Prof.G.S.Laddha(Director, A.C.College of Technology)
